channel.title: Cyber bullying question
channel.description: my friend cyber bullyed his old girlfriend, and she told her parents. they called his cell and left messages with the word "fuck" "i'm coming to your school tomarow" and threats. there has been 2 messages as far as i know. and i was somewhat involved because i told her to fuck off because she wouldn't leave him and my friends alone. any lawsuit here? thats what she said she'd do.

item.title: Cyber bullying question
item.dc:creator: @pk4pk pk4pk
item.description:
@pk4pk wrote:

I doubt you will get in trouble for saying “fuck off” because of the freedom of speech. It doesn’t offend them in away but just an aggressive statement with no hurtful feelings to get away. Your friend will most likely not go to court. For threatening phone calls just a restraining order and like a 300$ fee.

Read full topic

item.title: Cyber bullying question
item.dc:creator: @whothe0 the fu superior
item.description:
@whothe0 wrote:

Cyber bullying as in posting naked pictures

or saying “ur fugly r0mflmao”
“(insertnamehere) appears to be offline. messages sent will be received when he/she logs on”

Read full topic

item.title: Cyber bullying question
item.dc:creator: @Cryme_Time Cryme Time
item.description:
@Cryme_Time wrote:

whatever. she was just trying to scare him because nothing happened today. so whatever.

Read full topic

item.title: Cyber bullying question
item.dc:creator: @zilchuary zilchuary
item.description:
@zilchuary wrote:

… i dont understand what you are trying to say intill i read the other posts…
but … most probally he can get arrested but not a big charge

Read full topic

item.title: Cyber bullying question
item.dc:creator: @nhawkesn nhawkesn
item.description:
@nhawkesn wrote:

The internet is full of abuse tbh, people gotta learn to get a thicker skin and not let things get to them.
Anyway, arguing on the internet is like the special olypics… even if you win - your still retarded.

If you hassled her excessively and was texting her, ringing her and shit, she’d have a case, if not, dont worry

Read full topic

item.title: Cyber bullying question
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

People who are so called “Cyber bullied” should imo gtfo. There is a button somewhere on their computer that easily turns it off.

However if it were to continue to phone calls etc then of course its gotta be reported etc.

The OP of this thread seems like he doesn’t actually have a friend and is infact the one who cyber bullied a girl.

Read full topic

item.title: Cyber bullying question
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

If anything said to her was degrading (even referring to her as a bitch/slut/etc) then her right to not be subjected to degrading treatment, as outlined in the United Nations Declaration of Human Rights, has been violated.

Armed with that knowledge she could easily go after compensation if she really wanted to. People do it all the time.

Read full topic

item.title: Cyber bullying question
item.dc:creator: @gothic_queen casey.
item.description:
@gothic_queen wrote:

If you can recall, there was a girl(around 13) who committed suicide because a fake boy told her all this unjust stuff. Now the people who created the fake boy are on trial.
For the phone, they can be taken to court but the outcome would most likely be a restraining order.
For cyber bulling, it depends on what he said really, and I doubt anything can happen to you.

Read full topic

item.title: Cyber bullying question
item.dc:creator: @iceburster iceburster
item.description:
@iceburster wrote:

he can be arrested for cyber bullying, and she can be arrested for assault if she actually does something to him.

Read full topic
